verses.text: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* foolish man \w has|strong="H1732"\w* said \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* heart, God will \w not|strong="H1732"\w* do anything. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* are unclean, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* done evil \w works|strong="H5921"\w*; there \w is|strong="H1732"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* one who does good.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* looking down \w from|strong="H0430"\w* heaven \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* children \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w men|strong="H0559"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* see if \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w were|strong="H0369"\w* \w any|strong="H0369"\w* \w who|strong="H0369"\w* \w had|strong="H0430"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H3820"\w*, searching after \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Every \w one|strong="H0120"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* gone back; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* unclean: \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0120"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w does|strong="H3426"\w* good, no, \w not|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w workers|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* evil \w no|strong="H0369"\w* knowledge? \w they|strong="H1571"\w* take \w my|strong="H3605"\w* people \w for|strong="H3605"\w* food, \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w they|strong="H1571"\w* \w would|strong="H3605"\w* take bread; \w they|strong="H1571"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w God|strong="H0369"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* fear, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H0430"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* fear: \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* bones \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w those|strong="H0398"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* war \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* broken \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* put \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* shame, because \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* desire \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Israel \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H8033"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Zion! \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fate \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* changed \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* joy, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Israel \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* glad.
